welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pansol, the charming city known for its natural hot springs and stunning landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the beauty this place has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Available in all terminals and free for the first 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Baler Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
